languages.text: Whenever the Overseer falls unconscious, the cyber-eagle inflicts the {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}Portent of Death{/g} effect on the enemy that dealt the lethal damage (if any). Then, the cyber-eagle starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the Overseer falls unconscious, the Cyber-Eagle applies {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}The Death is Watching{/g} to an enemy that caused it (if there are any), then ascends.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the cyber-eagle inflicts the {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}portent of death{/g} effect on the enemy that dealt this lethal damage (if any). Then, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, киберорел накладывает эффект {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}знамение смерти{/g} на врага, нанесшего смертельный урон, если таковой есть. Затем киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}.

languages.text: Verliert der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} das {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Bewusstsein{/g}, belegt der Cyber-Adler den Gegner, der diesen tödlichen Schaden verursacht hat, mit {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}Omen des Todes{/g}. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}, le cyber-aigle inflige l'effet {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}Présage de mort{/g} à l'ennemi qui lui a infligé des dégâts mortels (le cas échéant). Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，生化猎鹰都会对造成致命伤害的敌人（如果有的话）施加{g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}死亡预兆{/g}效果，之后生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the cyber-eagle inflicts the {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}portent of death{/g} effect on the enemy that dealt this lethal damage (if any). Then, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当监察官陷入昏迷状态时，生化猎鹰都会对造成致命伤害的敌人（如果有的话）施加{g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}死亡预兆{/g}效果，之后生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。
每当监察官陷入昏迷状态时，生化猎鹰都会对造成致命伤害的敌人（如果有的话）施加{g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}死亡预兆{/g}效果，之后生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} queda {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, la ciberáguila inflige el efecto {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}Presagio mortal{/g} al enemigo que ha infligido el daño letal (si lo hay). Después, la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}.

Then, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor queda inconsciente, la ciberáguila inflige el efecto {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}Presagio mortal{/g} al enemigo que ha infligido el daño letal (si lo hay). Después, la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、サイバーイーグルはその致命的なダメージを与えた敵（該当する場合）に{g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}死の前兆{/g}効果を与える。その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。

Then, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官が意識不明になると、サイバーイーグルはその致命的なダメージを与えた敵（該当する場合）に{g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}死の前兆{/g}効果を与える。その後、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。

Siber kartal, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} baygın düştüğünde (varsa) bu ölümcül hasarı veren düşmanda {g|f:c45dc75658f24241abc5a13d8bbaa834}ölüme delalet{/g} etkisi oluşturur. Ardından siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar.
